thread.section_title: VISUAL-CLICK opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre VISUAL-CLICK | visual-click.com
thread.title: Yanisa Zafira

author: Yanisa Zafira
title: Yanisa Zafira
text: at first, i was really hesitated to order from visual click, as i saw many negative reviews about this website, plus it's located in spain while i live in the UK. however, since i needed my item as soon as possible, i just ordered it anyway yet still feeling hopeless to receive it in the near time. but it surprised me, i received the package on the day after my order! it's even faster than most of the UK based ones. my opinion, they will deliver it to you as fast as they can IF your item is available and noted "can be shipped immediately"
